models.name: Astra-Mini
models.description: A lightweight experimental transformer for fast local inference.
models.sample_output: Recursion is when a function calls itself to solve smaller parts of a problem.

models.name: Arclight-Embed
models.description: Model used for vectorization of text into semantic space.

experiments.title: Prompt Conditioning & Reasoning Depth
experiments.name: Prompt Conditioning & Reasoning Depth
experiments.description: Testing how different prompt styles change the reasoning quality.
experiments.method: Generated 40 variations of structured, unstructured, and constraint-based prompts.
experiments.observation: Constraint prompts improved reliability by reducing speculative completions.

experiments.title: Vector-based Semantic Clustering
experiments.name: Vector-based Semantic Clustering
experiments.description: Converting large text samples into embeddings and clustering them by topic.
experiments.method: Used cosine similarity thresholding and DBSCAN clustering.
experiments.observation: Distinct topic clusters emerged without supervision.

thoughtLog.entry: Astra-Mini improves under constrained prompting, indicating weak world modeling but strong instruction following.
Semantic embeddings reveal structural meaning that models don't express textually â€” meaning and representation can diverge.
